pkgmetadata.longdescription: Population Genetics Statistics for Selective Sweep // Selective Sweep can be calculated by five significant Population Genetics Statistics such as "Pi", "Wattersons_theta", "Tajima_D", "Kelly_ZnS" and "Omega" Statistics in specified chromosomal region. It has been developed by using the concept of "Kern" and "Schrider" (2018)doi:10.1534/g3.118.200262.
